LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.description: The ocular priest will use one of the colony's ocular dryads to warp a creature into an ocular monster. Depending on the ritual's outcome and the sacrificed creature's body size, a correspondingly stronger ocular monster will be summoned.
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.comps.1.label: participant count
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.comps.2.label: started at altar or ideogram
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.outcomeChances.0.label: Terrible
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.outcomeChances.0.descri: The {0} was terrible! A very weak ocular monster has joined the colony.
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.outcomeChances.1.label: Boring
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.outcomeChances.1.descri: The {0} was incredibly boring. A weak ocular monster has joined the colony.
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.outcomeChances.2.label: Satisfying
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.outcomeChances.2.descri: The {0} was satisfying. A medium sized ocular monster has joined the colony.
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.outcomeChances.3.label: Spectacular
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.outcomeChances.3.descri: The {0} was spectacular! A large ocular monster has joined the colony.
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.outcomeChances.4.label: Sublime
LanguageData.AA_OcularWarping.outcomeChances.4.descri: The {0} was sublime! An Unblinking Eye has pledged its servitude to the colony.
